description: To develop theoretical and practical skills for physical activity assessment, prescription and programming for individuals with, or at risk of cardiovascular or respiratory disease. To provide students with knowledge and skills in electrocardiography for which is applicable to the rehabilitation setting. To further develop skills and abilities in literature review and presentation; case study review and risk stratification.
prerequisites: Valid Apply First Aid inc. CPR
incompatible: HM811 or HM812 or HMST7316 or HMST3742:HMST7742
